external_games.name: Aerofly FS 2 - Just Flight - Hawk T1/A

name: Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator: Just Flight - Hawk T1/A
summary: The Hawk T1/A is an advanced military trainer jet which was developed for Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator. This highly detailed aircraft comes in 12 different pain schemes and features many custom systems and a realistic flight model.
